name: Bass Pro Shops Trophy Hunter 2007
summary: Bass Pro Shops Trophy Hunter 2007 challenges you to test your hunting instincts with all-new challenges. Equip yourself with the latest hunting equipment including bows, rifles, shotguns, and defensive firearms and take to 10 real-life regions! Use hides, calls, scents, lures, and stands to bring your award-winning Trophy in for the perfect kill.
